Shearers.Name: Shearers
Shearers.Ability: If an 'Animal' is in support; gain 1 gold income

Haste Boots.Name: Haste Boots
Haste Boots.Ability:
Grants RUSH
KICK GOLD 1 Grants HASTE

Mobility Boots.Name: Mobility Boots
Mobility Boots.Ability: Grants MOBILITY (Can move up to twice a turn, and after attacking, moving through columns still consumes attack)

Scouting Boots.Name: Scouting Boots
Scouting Boots.Ability: Grants SCOUTING (can move between columns and attack)

Poisoned Cloak.Name: Poisoned Cloak
Poisoned Cloak.Ability: The equipped unit takes 2 damage at the start of the host's turns. this damage increases by 1 per turn

Vampiric Blade.Name: Vampiric Blade
Vampiric Blade.Ability: Grants additional 1 Power while attacking units: when the host defeats a unit: heal hp up to the max hp of that unit

Titan Shield.Name: Titan Shield
Titan Shield.Ability: Grants 1 Armour to all adjacent units

Razor-Sharp Spear.Name: Razor-Sharp Spear
Razor-Sharp Spear.Ability: Grants PIERCING Grants +2 Power while attacking units

Organ Remover.Name: Organ Remover
Organ Remover.Ability: SLOW Sacrifice the equipped unit; if allied gain 4 gold

Unholy Sword.Name: Unholy Sword
Unholy Sword.Ability: Grants +1 power. If equipped unit was deployed from the graveyard, it grants +3 instead

Phantasm's Shroud.Name: Phantasm's Shroud
Phantasm's Shroud.Ability: Grants SHROUD (Unaffected by first enemy ability that targets this card each turn)

War Suit.Name: War Suit
War Suit.Ability: If Melee host grants 5 Health, if Ranged host grants 3 Health

Bookstand.Name: Bookstand
Bookstand.Ability: The cost of the first 'Oath' spell played in a turn is reduced by the cost of the equipped unit

Magic Sapping Glove.Name: Magic Sapping Glove
Magic Sapping Glove.Ability: Grants 1 additional power for every allied spell played after equipping

Magic Sapping Cloak.Name: Magic Sapping Cloak
Magic Sapping Cloak.Ability: Grants 2 additional health for every allied spell played after equipping
